summary: AN ORDINANCE regulating taxicab and for-hire vehicle licenses and for-hire vehicle drivers; stating conditions and fees for licensing; establishing rates to be charged for taxi and for-hire vehicle services; and declaring a moratorium on issuance of vehicle licenses, all by adding a new Chapter 6.213 to the Seattle Municipal Code; and repealing SMC 6.204.050, 6.208 and 6.212 accordingly.
